name: Historical records, traits and trends for EU bees
description: Code for Historical trends show more losers than winners among European pollinators.

variableMeasured.name: scientificName
variableMeasured.description: Taxonomic species

variableMeasured.name: endYear
variableMeasured.description: Year of the sampling

variableMeasured.name: endMonth
variableMeasured.description: Month of the sampling

variableMeasured.name: endDay
variableMeasured.description: Day of the sampling

variableMeasured.name: country
variableMeasured.description: Country where the data was collected

variableMeasured.name: genus
variableMeasured.description: Taxonomic genera

variableMeasured.name: family
variableMeasured.description: Taxonomic family

variableMeasured.name: occurrenceID
variableMeasured.description: Occurrence identifier

variableMeasured.name: datasetProvider
variableMeasured.description: The provider of the original dataset

variableMeasured.name: institutionName
variableMeasured.description: The institution of the author sharinf the data

variableMeasured.name: scientificNameAuthorship
variableMeasured.description: The name of the author sharing the data

variableMeasured.name: taxo_group
variableMeasured.description: Either bees or hoverflies

variableMeasured.name: gridID_20
variableMeasured.description: Identifier of grid cell at 20 km-side resolution

variableMeasured.name: region_20
variableMeasured.description: Name of the region of the grid cell at 20 km-side resolution

variableMeasured.description: Identifier of grid cell at 50 km-side resolution

variableMeasured.description: Identifier of grid cell at 100 km-side resolution

variableMeasured.description: Name of the region of the grid cellat 100 km-side resolution

variableMeasured.description: Identifier of grid cell at 200 km-side resolution

variableMeasured.name: region_200
variableMeasured.description: Name of the region of the grid at 20 km-side resolution

variableMeasured.name: geometry
variableMeasured.description: Latitude and Longitude combined in an object

variableMeasured.name: decimalLongitude
variableMeasured.description: Longitude in ETRS89 / LAEA Europe (EPSG:3035) coordinate system

variableMeasured.name: decimalLatitude
variableMeasured.description: Latitude in ETRS89 / LAEA Europe (EPSG:3035) coordinate system

variableMeasured.name: time_period
variableMeasured.description: Twenty-year period of the sampling (e.g. 1961-1981)

variableMeasured.name: scientificName
variableMeasured.description: Accepted full species name

variableMeasured.name: Group
variableMeasured.description: Taxonomic groups: Either bees or hoverflies
Total number of records of the species in scientificName in this period (years 1921 to 1940)
Total number of records of the species in scientificName in this period (years 1941 to 1960)
Total number of records of the species in scientificName in this period (years 1961 to 1980)
Total number of records of the species in scientificName in this period (years 1981 to 2000)
Total number of records of the species in scientificName in this period (years 2001 to 2020)

variableMeasured.name: mediterranean
variableMeasured.description: Occupancy trend (logit scale: log(growth rate)) for the species in scientificName in the Mediterranean biogeoregion (for the full study time  1921- 2020)

variableMeasured.name: alpine
variableMeasured.description: Occupancy trend (logit scale: log(growth rate)) for the species in scientificName in the Alpine biogeoregion (for the full study time 1921- 2020)

variableMeasured.name: atlantic
variableMeasured.description: Occupancy trend (logit scale: log(growth rate)) for the species in scientificName in the Atlantic biogeoregion (for the full study time 1921- 2020)

variableMeasured.name: continental
variableMeasured.description: Occupancy trend (logit scale: log(growth rate)) for the species in scientificName in the Continental biogeoregion (for the full study time 1921- 2020)

variableMeasured.name: boreal
variableMeasured.description: Occupancy trend (logit scale: log(growth rate)) for the species in scientificName in the Boreal biogeoregion (for the full study time 1921- 2020)

variableMeasured.name: Species
variableMeasured.description: Taxonomic species

variableMeasured.description: Taxonomic order

variableMeasured.description: Taxonomic family

variableMeasured.name: Genus
variableMeasured.description: Taxonomic genera

variableMeasured.name: Sociality
variableMeasured.description: Bee category of sociality (7 categories).

variableMeasured.name: STI_Species_temperature_index
variableMeasured.description: Species temperature index retrieved from their distribution (centroid)

variableMeasured.name: Larval_diet_breadth
variableMeasured.description: Breadth of the diet in bees (2 categories: oligolectic or polylectic)

variableMeasured.name: ITD_F_mm
variableMeasured.description: Inter-tegular distance measured in mm in females of each bee species

variableMeasured.name: Adult_Body_size
variableMeasured.description: Hoverfly body size (5 categories)

variableMeasured.name: Larval_nutrition
variableMeasured.description: Type of nutrition in hoverfly larvae (5 categories)

variableMeasured.name: Flight_ability
variableMeasured.description: Capacity to flight (2 categories)

variableMeasured.name: Flight_height
variableMeasured.description: Category of hoverfly flight height (3 categories)

variableMeasured.name: scientificNameAuthorship
variableMeasured.description: Authorship of the species description

variableMeasured.name: year_description
variableMeasured.description: Year of species description

variableMeasured.name: European_Category
variableMeasured.description: IUCN redlist conservation status

variableMeasured.name: European_Category_2025
variableMeasured.description: IUCN Bee status according to the new report

variableMeasured.name: Sociality_simplified
variableMeasured.description: Bee category of sociality simplified into (Social, parasite, solitary)

variableMeasured.name: Adult_Body_size_num
variableMeasured.description: Body size of hoherflies as a category (from 1 to 5)
